description: This file defines a React component named SongList which displays a list of songs with loading, error handling, and refresh capabilities. It includes helper functions for formatting song durations and normalizing song objects received from various backend payload formats.

methods.name: formatDuration(seconds)
methods.description: Formats a duration in seconds into a 'minutes:seconds' string, handling invalid inputs.

methods.name: normalizeSong(raw)
methods.description: Converts raw song data into a normalized object with consistent keys, supporting various backend payloads.

methods.name: SongList({ songs, loading, error, onPlay, onRefresh })

ctags.name: SongList
ctags.pattern: /^export function SongList({ songs, loading, error, onPlay, onRefresh }) {$/
